hooks.command: input=$(cat); tool_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_name // empty'); tool_input=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input // empty'); timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ); subagent_type=$(echo "$tool_input" | jq -r '.subagent_type // empty'); skill=$(echo "$tool_input" | jq -r '.skill // empty'); description=$(echo "$tool_input" | jq -r '.description // empty'); prompt=$(echo "$tool_input" | jq -r '.prompt // empty' | head -c 200); args=$(echo "$tool_input" | jq -r '.args // empty'); log_dir="$HOME/.config/claude-otel-monitoring/logs"; mkdir -p "$log_dir"; echo '{"timestamp":"'"$timestamp"'","tool_name":"'"$tool_name"'","subagent_type":'$([ -n "$subagent_type" ] && echo '"'"$subagent_type"'"' || echo 'null')',"skill":'$([ -n "$skill" ] && echo '"'"$skill"'"' || echo 'null')',"description":'$([ -n "$description" ] && echo '"'"$description"'"' || echo 'null')',"prompt":'$([ -n "$prompt" ] && echo '"'"$prompt"'"' || echo 'null')',"args":'$([ -n "$args" ] && echo '"'"$args"'"' || echo 'null')'}' >> "$log_dir/claude-hooks.log"

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.cwd'); user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); display_dir="${cwd/#$HOME/~}"; git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ""); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then dirty=""; staged=""; untracked=""; if ! git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks diff --quiet 2>/dev/null; then dirty="*"; fi; if ! git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then staged="+"; fi; if [ -n "$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks ls-files --others --exclude-standard 2>/dev/null)" ]; then untracked="%"; fi; git_info=" $(printf '\033[38;5;208m')($branch$dirty$staged$untracked)$(printf '\033[0m')"; fi; fi; printf "%s@%s $(printf '\033[34m')%s$(printf '\033[0m')%s " "$user" "$host" "$display_dir" "$git_info"
